generalTraits.traitDescription: An elf can see twice as far as a human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. She retains the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

For all effects related to race, a half-elf is considered an elf. Half-elves, for example, are just as vulnerable to special effects that affect elves as their elf ancestors are, and they can use magic items that are only usable by elves.

checksAndSaves.name: Spell resistance
checksAndSaves.description: Immunity to magic sleep effects, and a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells or effects.

checksAndSaves.name: Keen senses
checksAndSaves.description: +1 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks: A half-elf does not have the elfâ€™s ability to notice secret doors simply by passing near them. Half-elves have keen senses, but not as keen as those of an elf.

checksAndSaves.name: Diplomatic
checksAndSaves.description: +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Gather Information checks: Half-elves get along naturally with all people.

extraLanguages: any again. I'm a typescript dev, I hate any
